script.name: OS - Background Images
script.script_contents:
# BACKGROUND PICTURES chmod -R 777 /Library/Desktop\ Pictures/AWC-Pictures rm -rf /Library/Desktop\ Pictures/El\ Capitan.jpg rm -rf /Library/Desktop\ Pictures/Sierra.jpg rm -rf /Library/Desktop\ Pictures/Mojave.heic cp -R /Library/Desktop\ Pictures/AWC-Pictures/AWC\ Desktop\ Image\ 1024x768.bmp /Library/Desktop\ Pictures/Sierra.jpg cp -R /Library/Desktop\ Pictures/AWC-Pictures/AWC\ Desktop\ Image\ 1024x768.bmp /Library/Desktop\ Pictures/El\ Capitan.jpg cp -R /Library/Desktop\ Pictures/AWC-Pictures/Mojave.heic /Library/Desktop\ Pictures/Mojave.heic
# SET BACKGROUND PICTURE FOR USER TEMPLATE mkdir /System/Library/User\ Template/English.lproj/Library/Application\ Support/Dock cp -R /Users/admin/Library/Application\ Support/Dock/desktoppicture.db /System/Library/User\ Template/English.lproj/Library/Application\ Support/Dock/ sqlite3 /System/Library/User\ Template/English.lproj/Library/Application\ Support/Dock/desktoppicture.db "update data set value = '/Library/Desktop Pictures/AWC-Pictures/AWC Desktop Image 1024x768.bmp'";
